questions.paragraph: When primary producers die, food webs are disrupted. Mention the reason.
popup: Because they are the only organisms capable of producing their own food, and storing the energy that other living organisms depend on.

questions.paragraph: If an oil spill from a ship leads to the death of small fish, what impact does this have on marine birds?
popup: It will either migrate or die as it won't find its food.

questions.paragraph: How do we protect marine organisms from overfishing?
popup: By establishing protected marine environments, and working with fishermen to prevent overfishing.

questions.paragraph: There are several human activities that lead to the destruction of habitats of living organisms. Mention one example.
Climate change leads to the migration of small planktons that small fish feed on. What happens to these small fish?
popup: It will either migrate or die as it won't find its food.
